ovdesc.p: Work file used by the bulk order processing service to build SEC.OPEN.ORDER details.

desc.p: Key to identify which service agent updated the record.
The security for which the order should placed for.
The transaction code for which the order should placed for.
Work key/Id to identify the record.
The depository for which the order details apply.
The nominal for which the order should placed for.
The nominee for which the order details apply.
This field will be updated only when SEC.ACC.MASTER is shared across companies. This field will indicate the company in which SEC.OPEN.ORDER has to be created.
Help Text for this field is unavailable. Please refer to the T24 User Guides for further information.
